topic.title: How to Find out Why My XInclude Failed?

section.p: If you see black empty xinclude brackets or you see a fallback element instead of your xincluded document, it means that for some reason Serna could not locate the file you wanted to xinclude. To find out the reason, put a cursor in the brackets and select Entity Current XInclude Status... . Detailed status and error report will be shown.
